response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This incredible opportunity is worth an estimated value of $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering this unique item to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, providing you with a fantastic opportunity to acquire it at a premium yet affordable rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional offer. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, and I am eager to facilitate this transaction for you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
